ygData.subject: Re: patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour    question
ygData.msgSnippet: Err I myself surely online in Innoruuk up to ard 1-2am, hehe.
ygData.messageBody:
Err I myself surely online in Innoruuk up to ard 1-2am, hehe.

On Wednesday, June 23, 1999 2:29 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...] wrote:
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> How long do you think it took me to get to 36? A level that is a good 4 times
> more than your current level. You can affort to change servers at such a young
> level and since you will be grouping with others more or less from the start, it
> means that you gain experience at a faster level.
>
> No body around pass midnight at Innoruuk? For the pass week, I've been grouping
> with Eriz(Davis Tuea), Aaleku(Hans) and Kellendil (Kelvin) During the afternoon,
> midnight, dead of the night etc...... Still can find LOCAL kakis to be with (if
> all else fail, can still find Gary to beg a few plats from)
>
> Heck, before we finally agree on which server to be at, I was
>
> Initially - Cazic Thule/Sabella/Level 34 Enchanter
> Then - Innoruuk/Sabella/Level 9 Enchanter
> Then someone suggested we move over to prexus - Prexus/Liath/Level 8 Paladin
> Then, final disision is to move back to Innoruuk.
> Due to lack of support classes, I created another new character -
> Innoruuk/Sereph/Level 9 parang carrying bard.
> In between moving - Cazic Thule/Sabella/Level 36 Enchanter
>
> Ganna move so many times also didn't complain...... A lot of other people also
> ganna the same thing.
>
> EQ is about grouping/adventuring with people, isn't that the main reason you
> join the list? Now you're telling us that you are on another server, away from
> us, and not changing it.
>
> *do the infamous hand banging action*
>
> The beta servers are all way over crowded. I got out of Cazic for 2 main reason.
>
> 1. No one wants to group with me
> 2. The several high level dungeons are heavily camped
>
> Still don't want to change?
>
> Address please..... I need some way to release my fustration.
>
> Yap Sieh Roy wrote:
>
> > From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
> >
> > ahh ..
> > i spent 3 weeks to reach lvl 8 leh... btw, i'm working, so i can only log in
> > at late nite usually after 12midnite. maybe that's y there's no pple in the
> > innnoruk server.
> > fennin and veeshan is loaded with pple at that time...
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 1:28 PM
> > Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour
> > question
> >
> > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > >
> > > Cazic Thule/Veeshan/Rallos Zek are the 3 most porpular servers, when the
> > fish
> > > did Fenin Fo get there?
> > >
> > > I'm warning you, get over to Innoruuk or you'r dead meat. Besides, in
> > those
> > > servers, most of the people are ABOVE level 20, so the level 1-20 area are
> > VERY
> > > dry. Prexus would be a good place to be if you want more people to be with
> > you
> > >
> > > Level 8 is a low level, if I can give up a level 36 enchanter, I can't see
> > why
> > > you can't give up a level 8 warrior
> > >
> > > As a conculsion, get to Innoruuk in A WEEK or you MUST send us YOUR
> > ADDRESS.
> > > Prepare for a surprise.
> > >
> > > Yap Sieh Roy wrote:
> > >
> > > > From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
> > > >
> > > > aiya..
> > > >
> > > > more pple more shiok mah!!
> > > > fennin and veeshan always got close to 1000 players online ..
> > > > innoruk got around 600 only ??
> > > >
> > > > roy
> > > >
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > > Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 11:00 AM
> > > > Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] patchwork, studded and reinforced leather
> > armour
> > > > question
> > > >
> > > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > Err Fennin Ro server? Come to Innoruuk lah. Our parang chopper got
> > lvl
> > > > 35
> > > > > enchanter elsewhere also LPPL start a new one in Innoruuk. U wanna
> > kena
> > > > > chopped issit? ;)
> > > > >
> > > > > Now most impt is to get my wiz to lvl 16 and get the invis spell
> > first.
> > > > > W/o it my butt kena kicked until sored. Last night I'm hunting derv
> > > > > alone, sharing kills with another 2 group of lvl 10-12 players. Seem
> > like
> > > > > good xp there, but down time kinda long coz I used up at least 80% of
> > my
> > > > > mana for every kill ;( Other groups kill 2 b4 I can kill 1, sigh.
> > > > >
> > > > > Ziltus
> > > > >
> > > > > On Wednesday, June 23, 1999 10:10 AM, Yap Sieh Roy
> > > > > [SMTP:sryap@...] wrote:
> > > > > > From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
> > > > > >
> > > > > > oops .. here it is ...
> > > > > >
> > > > > > koradaf/fennin ro server/lvl 8/warrior/currently hanging around
> > freeport
> > > > > >
> > > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > > > > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > > > > Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 1:24 AM
> > > > > > Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] patchwork, studded and reinforced
> > leather
> > > > > armour
> > > > > > question
> > > > > >
> > > > > >
> > > > > > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > You still have not surrender your character
> > name/location/level/class
> > > > > to
> > > > > > > me...... Wanna be chop izzit?
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Yap Sieh Roy wrote:
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > hi,
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > been trying to practise my tailoring skillz.. i got a couple of
> > > > > > questions
> > > > > > > > abt making armour, hope u guys can help.
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > ruined pelt + pattern = patchwork armour
> > > > > > > > medium pelt + studs + pattern = studded armour
> > > > > > > > hi-quality pelt + file + pattern = reinforced armour
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > the above is as far as i understand from the tailoring book.
> > there
> > > > is
> > > > > > only 2
> > > > > > > > slots in the sewing kit so.patchwork is no problem but what
> > about
> > > > > > studded
> > > > > > > > and reinforced where 3 items are required? what is the sequence
> > of
> > > > > > making
> > > > > > > > them ?
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > thanks !
> > > > > > > > roy
